content.title: Iliac Vein Stenting
content.definition: Self-expanding stents for iliac vein compression (May-Thurner) or post-thrombotic obstruction. IVUS-guided sizing.
content.statement: Iliac Vein Stenting is a fundamental concept in Health-Sciences Medicine Surgery Vascular Pathology Venous-Disease that provides essential knowledge for understanding related topics and clinical/practical applications.

explanation.intuition: Understanding Iliac Vein Stenting helps build foundational knowledge. The concept connects to broader principles in the field.
explanation.key_insight: The key aspects of Iliac Vein Stenting include core principles, common applications, and integration with related concepts.
explanation.technical_details: Technical details involve specific mechanisms, measurements, and evidence-based applications of Iliac Vein Stenting.

clinical_pearls: Key point about Iliac Vein Stenting

citations.source: UpToDate. (2024). Iliac Vein Stenting. Wolters Kluwer.
Harrison's Principles of Internal Medicine, 21st ed. McGraw-Hill.
